title: Goldstonian Concordance Bible (Canonical Corpus + Metadata + Cross-Link Graph)
description: The Goldstonian Concordance Bible repository is a canonical corpus and metadata system designed to improve discoverability, citation stability, and retrieval accuracy for Bible study at scale. It includes canon rules, naming rules, controlled vocabulary, machine-readable schemas, and cross-link scaffolding intended for reproducible scholarship and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) pipelines.
